body:
This would be awesome! Right now I have to destroy the chart and recreate it. Unfortunately after doing so I have to set all my options again, since they are being changed dynamically by the user as well. If we could set it dynamically that would make it so much easier!

Also, great work on this js library, it is seriously awesome. :)
Sorry but gauge series not support dataZoom component

Hi, name is picked from geoJson. You can register a geoJson with english names.

See [registerMap](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/api.html#echarts.registerMap)
